This means finding an element in the group that, when multiplied by -i, results in 1 (the identity element).  *   -i * 1 = -i *   -i * -1 = i *   -i * i = -i * i = -(-1) = 1 *   -i * -i = (-i) * (-i) = -1  Since -i * i = 1, the multiplicative inverse of -i is i.  **Answer:**  i...
